Tell Stories with Your Data

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”22px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Data is mission-critical to the advancement of any business, but it loses value if we are unable to understand and visualize it.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Let’s Get Started” _builder_version=”3.19.2″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_use_color_gradient=”on” button_bg_color_gradient_start=”#5DE455″ button_bg_color_gradient_end=”#14C0AA” button_bg_color_gradient_direction=”210deg” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”80px||” custom_padding=”20px|72px|20px|72px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”26px” box_shadow_blur=”92px” box_shadow_spread=”3px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/left-bg8.svg” background_size=”initial” background_position=”center_left” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]Next-gen Application Development[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Build Applications of the Future with AI & Machine Learning

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”8%” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”24px||32px” animation_style=”zoom” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Imagine a world where you get your data out of spreadsheets and enable teams to actually utilize data in innovative workflows. Let them share, take notes and collaborate on data where they want it, when they want it in conversational applications.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”3.25″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_css_main_element=”margin: auto auto 0;” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Visual-Dashboards.svg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Visualize

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” custom_margin=”0px||24px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Visual Dashboards

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”12%” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” max_width=”75%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let us guess, you’re swimming in data. Unfortunately, its in a database or a stack of spreadsheets. With open source platforms we can build custom dashboards built just for you. Place them on a big screen in the middle of the office. Create a data central command. Your imagination is your limit.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”3.25″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Customize

Custom Applications

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.9″ max_width=”12%” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” max_width=”75%” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_font_size=”28px” header_4_line_height=”1.8em” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”|32px||32px||true” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

boost productivity
